p:
The following formula was used for calculating the activity index:
\documentclass[12pt]{minimal} \usepackage{amsmath} \usepackage{wasysym} \usepackage{amsfonts} \usepackage{amssymb} \usepackage{amsbsy} \usepackage{mathrsfs} \usepackage{upgreek} \setlength{\oddsidemargin}{-69pt} \begin{document}$$ \mathrm{Activity}\ \mathrm{index}=\frac{\mathrm{zone}\ \mathrm{of}\ \mathrm{inhibition}\ \mathrm{of}\ \mathrm{plant}\ \mathrm{extract}}{\mathrm{zone}\ \mathrm{of}\ \mathrm{inhibition}\ \mathrm{of}\ \mathrm{antibiotic}\ \mathrm{disc}} $$\end{document}
Activity index =
zone of inhibition of plant extract zone of inhibition of antibiotic disc
